title: The Search for General Du Couteau / Lore Notes

replies.body:
HIS NAME IS MARCUS?!

i've been calling him chad for years

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=puiru1hn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-17T00:21:13.325+0000)
>
> HIS NAME IS MARCUS?!
> 
> i've been calling him chad for years


Clearly, he was a man of many faces and many secrets. Even to his own Shadow. {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=puiru1hn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-17T00:21:13.325+0000)
>
> HIS NAME IS MARCUS?!
> 
> i've been calling him chad for years

What an absolute mad chad

Y'know, personally I grew bored and uninterested in this Du Couteau mystery. Although im always interested to talk about it.

Its hooks were laid into lore many friggin years ago, and nothing has moved forward. Which surprisingly isnt the reason why im not interested in Coutaeu's disappearance but rather theres never been a shred of evidence or clue as to why. We can sit here all day and theory-craft, but at the end of it nothing is anymore likely than trying to guess what a Frozen Watcher is exactly.

I understand that not knowing is the definition of the mystery, but we had a Noxus Lu this year. I would have liked to see some new and intriguing bait, examples that could lead to be the motive. Instead its much the same as before still. Guy disappeared, people dont know why, most (except Talon) dont seem to care as to why, someone probably killed him.
Ah except there’s one darkin left so maybe he could have.

> [{quoted}](name=PERIMITION,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=puiru1hn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-20T05:56:07.959+0000)
>
> Ah except there’s one darkin left so maybe he could have.

Then he'd be Chaad.
But noxus is led by survival of the fittest so, I guess..
